articles.content: Sri Lanka's young pace sensation Matheesha Pathirana opened up on Chennai Super Kings' big role in his elevation to international cricket. The right-arm pacer grabbed the eyeballs during the 2022 U-1… [+2004 chars]

articles.title: Red Bull restrict Verstappen sim racing activities - Last Word On Sports
articles.description: Red Bull and Max Verstappen have reached an agreement to put a limit on the Dutchman's sim racing outside of F1.
